modName: Draugr Marauder armor for Sevenbase bombshell - UNPB tbbp and cbbe bbp
summary: Adds a modular set of light armor to the game
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][size=3]Unpb version is up for download, conversion was done by KaosWulf707 and includes a combined esp. If you are content with the esp(s) from either mainfile then use those. Idont know if anything was changed in the esp or not.
Big thanks to KaosWulf707 for doing the conversion.[u] [/u][/size][b][u]
The Cbbe/bodyslide versions are ready for download and require 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][b]HDT Physics Extensions[/b] by HydrogensaysHDT[/url]
Big thanks to kofman77 for taking the time to do the conversion

Also uploaded an optional merged file that includes everything but the cbbe stuff. This file will require you to re-craft the armor. Should be nmm friendly (something i forgot to consider with part 1 and 2).


[size=4]The collar clips through the front of the neck while sneaking. I messed with it for a few hours trying differnt things and cannot get it weighted correctly
[youtube]QyQu_0ZfTAM[/youtube][/size][/u][/b][/size]

This is nothing fancy and there is not alot to it. Just a set of armor that i started for my character and how i wanted it to look. Some may like and some will not. Although Draugr bikini probably would have been a more suitable name.
Adds a modular Draugr themed set of  light armor to the game.
I started this for my character and figured i would share it. Uses some bits from my dragonbone marauder armor, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5134496]Shockero[/url] 's dragonbone barbarian armor and the rest is obviously vanilla assets.

The boots are still wip and i dont know when I'll finish them....trying to give them a proper fur look with alphas but everything i tried looked really bad.
All are craftable under steel.
[size=4]The spiked collar is craftable under jewelery[/size]
For balance reasons, only the helm, boots, and base armor are upgradeable but everything is enchantable.

One thing to note is the shoulders V1 and V2 weighted kinda funny and i can't fix it.
Version 2 uses most of theminblacks barbarian top.


[size=4][b]==========
Installation
==========
1. Extract the meshes, both esp, and texture folders to Skyrim Data folder.
activate the esps[/b][/size]

=============
Requirements:
=============
For the cbbe mesh...cbbe compatible textures(obviously)
[size=4][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] or any bbp compatiple skeleton[/size]
UNP compatible skin textures
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url][/size] for the bodyslide version
[size=5][b][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][b]HDT Physics Extensions[/b] by HydrogensaysHDT[/url]  [/u][/b][/size]for the hdt versions
Conflicts:
[b][size=4]This mod possibly conflicts with SOS (Schlongs of Skyrim)...dont know because i dont use it.[/size][/b]

[size=4]=================
Credits and Thanks:
=================

Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity for the sevenbase body[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992]Sevenbase Body replacer[/url]
TheMinBlack  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19004][b]TheMinBlack's ArmorShop.[/b][/url][size=4]open permission granted in permission tab[/size]
Shockero for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52711]Dragonbone Barbarian Armors - 7B - UNPB - CBBE[/url]
Bethesda soft for making skyrim and the hd textures included in the mod from the free hd texture dlc.
Caliente for bodyslide2 and cbbe meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio[/url]
Thanks to kofman77 for the cbbe meshes/bodyslide conversions[/size]
author: Trumpdog
